    • Method Detail

      • findAppRegistryKey

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> findAppRegistryKey(java.lang.String appName)
        Method searches for the application appName entry. Method checks first the HKLM. If entry not found than it is searched in HKCU.
        Parameters:
        appName -
        Returns:
        Optional string which is the name of registry folder

      • queryKey

        Method returns the content of registry folder.
        Parameters:
        registryFolder -
        Returns:
        Optional collection of registry folder content
